targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "Instant" WHERE ("name" = 'PRODUCTION') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

options.content:
By installing 2 in your solar system, and clamping the first PZEM toroid onto main house loads and the second PZEM toroid onto solar inverter, you can monitor "Grid Consumption Energy" (the energy consumed from the grid), " Solar Production Energy" (the energy producted by solar inverter), and "Exported Energy" (the calculated energy exported to the grid) You can monitor the energy flow of the solar system.

Enjoy and have fun on Solar Balancer
